author: remm
msg: - I think the package triggers are no longer useful (especially on JDK 1.5, where everything got package renamed).
- On JDK 1.4, there won't be any problem if Xerces and Xalan are endorsed (AFAIK, they need to be to be able to be used).

author: remm
